org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant

Class PasswordGrantHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant.AbstractAuthorizationGrantHandler
      • org.wso2.carbon.identity.oauth2.token.handlers.grant.PasswordGrantHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationGrantHandler

    public class PasswordGrantHandler
extends AbstractAuthorizationGrantHandler
    Handles the Password Grant Type of the OAuth 2.0 specification. Resource owner sends his credentials in the token request which is validated against the corresponding user store. Grant Type : password
